full_text: Bae el Pieris er | Spratt Beer 2024/KER/4447 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE BECHU KURIAN THOMAS THURSDAY, THE 18" pAY OF JANUARY 2024 / 28TH POUSHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO. 519 OF 2024 CRIME NO.48/2011 OF OLLUR POLICE STATION, THRISSUR AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT CC 136/2016 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -III, THRISSUR PETITIONER/2ND ACCUSED: INDIRA, AGED 44 YEARS W/O.RAMACHANDRAN, CHAMAKKALAYAIL HOUSE, CHUNAGANDU DESOM, AMBALAPPARA VILLAGE, OTTAPPALAM TALUK, THRISSUR DISTRICT - 679 512. BY ADVS. N.L.BITTO MITHUL T ANTO RESPONDENT/STATE : STATE OF KERALA REP. BY THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, OLLUR POLICE STATION, THRISSUR DISTRICT, THROUGH THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM, PIN - 682031 SMT. V. SREEJA (PP) THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 18.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2024/KER/4447 CRL.MC 519/2024 2 BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, J arena ORDER Petitioner is the sole accused in C.C.No.136/2016 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-III, Thrissur; alleging offences punishable under Sections 406 and 420 of the Indian Penal Code, 1860. Since the petitioner failed to appear before the trial court on the date of posting, a warrant has been issued, and proceedings have been initiated under Sections 82 and 83, of Cr.P.C. Hence, this petition. 2. Sri.N.L.Bitto, the learned counsel for the petitioner, submitted that petitioner is willing to appear before the trial court, and seek bail and also participate in the proceedings without _ fail. However, petitioner apprehends that she may be remanded to custody. 3. I have heard Smt.Sreeja V., the learned Public Prosecutor as well. 2024/KER/4447 CRL.MC 519/2024 3 4. Having regard to the circumstances arising in the case, I am of the view that this Crl.M.C. can be disposed of with a direction. 5. Accordingly, there will be a direction to the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-III, Thrissur, to consider the application for recall of warrant and for grant of bail, positively on the same day itself, provided such applications are filed by the petitioner on or before 29.01.2024. The Crl.M.C.is disposed of. sd/- BECHU KURIAN THOMAS JUDGE AMV/19/01/2024 Bae el Pieris er | Spratt Beer 2024/KER/4447 CRL.MC 519/2024 4 APPENDIX OF CRL.MC 519/2024 PETITIONER ANNEXURES ANNEXURE -I A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO. 48 OF 2011 OF THE OLLUR POLICE STATION DATED 16/1/2011 ANNEXURE -II A TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CC.136 OF 2016 ON THE FILES OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT NO.III DATED 14/06/2011 TRUE COPY
